messages.title: Plaid Pension Promise
messages.content: It is estimated that 1,000 pensioners are missing out because they are unaware of the pension credit they are entitled to. We would assist pensioners to include the value of the pension credit in the income tax base and this would pay for the higher £100 for higher earners and those pensioners losing out on taxable income. Times to change, time for tax fairness for pensioners earning more than £100,000.

messages.title: Cardiff West Labour MP Shame
messages.content: Do you know that current Cardiff West MP Kevin Brennan, whose salary is over £100,000, took money from taxpayers money to buy a £450 television? Who will best stand up for our taxes? Kevin watches is watching a luxury TV.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Boosting the local economy and infrastructure
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Policies focused on reforming the banks, investing in local workers, and transforming institutions.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarul is 38 years old and has lived in Riverside for the last 20 years. He has been a Riverside Plaid councillor since 2004. He has served as the Deputy Chair of the Planning Committee for Cardiff Council and currently serving as the Chair of the Economy & Culture Scrutiny Committee. Sarul is an experienced local business man and also served as a Chair of Cardiff Stop the War Coalition for 2 years and for the past 6 years has been a School Governor for Kitchener Primary School. He is passionate about Cardiff.
